message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which is truly a game-changer in its field. It offers unparalleled benefits and has been highly sought after by many top-tier clients. Considering its exceptional quality and unique features, I would like to extend an exclusive offer to you. For a limited time only, I am willing to sell this product to you for $2000000. This is a special opportunity to secure such a valuable asset at a competitive price. Let me know if you're interested in discussing further details or making a purchase.

I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1500000. I believe it's a bit steep at $2000000, considering the market value. I'd like to discuss further and see if we can meet in the middle.
